string.value: According to rumors, an something has been appearing near Leafre and causing problems for the town. Go see #bChief Tatamo#k to find out more details.
Go meet #bChief Tatamo#k in Leafre and found out about what's been happening in there.
You met with #bChief Tatamo#k and received a request to investigate the strange case happening in the town.
Ahem... Can you hear me? #b#h0##k, my town is in dire need of help. Please listen to my plea. I beg you.
Many strange things have been happening in Leafre. As the town chief, I have been trying to handle it, but I haven't been able to do much. We need a true warrior like you, #b#h0##k to help us!
Please consider my plea, and then talk to me, #bTatamo#k, the chief of Leafre.
In that case, our town is doomed for sure...
Have you made your decision? I had no doubt, #b#h0##k, that you would help.
My town has remained peaceful by maintaining good relations with the Dragon race. But recently, strange things have happened.
